name: Spirit Box Response
about:
[Spirit Box evidence](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Spirit_Box_(Evidence)) can be obtained by using a [Spirit Box](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Spirit_Box) and getting a response from the ghost when asking a question from [this list](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Spirit_Box#Types_of_questions) of questions.
- The player must either be in the same room as the ghost, or within 3 meters of it.
- All ambient lighting in the said room must be off.
- Some ghosts only respond to people who are alone.
- When all conditions are satisfied, the ghost becomes more likely to respond. This likelihood increases with the tier of the Spirit Box.

name: Freezing Temperatures
about:
[Freezing Temperatures](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Freezing_Temperatures) are detecting by using a [thermometer](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Thermometer).
- The presence of player breath does not indicate freezing temperatures. A reading of 32Â°F or below is required.
- Temperatures will adjust over time, and therefore multiple rooms can be freezing and a freezing room does not guarantee a ghost is in that room.
- The thermometer fluctuates by -2 / +4 degrees.
- Any ghost type's presence in a room will cause the room's [temperature](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Temperature) to drop over time.

name: Fingerprints
about:
[Fingerprints](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Fingerprints) are detected using [UV Flashlights](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/UV_Flashlight) or [Glowsticks](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Glowstick). They appear after a ghost interacts with certain surfaces, mostly being doors and light switches.
- Each interaction with a surface will always leave a fingerprint.
- The exception is the [Obake](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Obake), who has a chance to leave fingerprints (75%), which can also be unique (~17%).
- Fingerprints must be "charged" with [UV Light](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/UV_Light) before collecting [photo rewards](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Photo_Rewards).
- Footprints, although visually similar, do not count.

name: D.O.T.S.
about:
[D.O.T.S.](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/D.O.T.S_Projector_(Evidence)) are detected using [D.O.T.S. Projectors](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/D.O.T.S._Projector). The evidence appears as a ghostly silhouette or hologram in the light of the projector when a ghost passes through it.
- You can see this figure through a [video camera](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Video_Camera). With a video camera in night vision mode, visibility of the figure may be much better. 
- If you have a Goryo, the effect will only appear through a [video camera](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Video_Camera) while nobody is in the room.

name: EMF Level 5
about:
[EMF Level 5](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/EMF_Level_5) is detected using an [EMF Reader](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/EMF_Reader). An activity that would normally leave an EMF Level 2 or 3 reading has a 25% chance to leave an EMF Level 5 reading instead.
- EMF Level 2 indicates an interaction has happened, EMF Level 3 indicates an object was thrown, and EMF Level 4 indicates the ghost manifested.
- The EMF Reader must be within about 1.5 meters of an activity to display a reading.

name: Ghost Writing
about:
[Ghost Writing](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Ghost_Writing) is detected when a ghost writes in a [Ghost Writing Book](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Ghost_Writing_Book).
- The ghost can draw a random image in the ghost book, which has no relation to the ghost's type.
- There are six different drawings the ghost can produce.
- Ghosts will prioritize writing in an open book rather than throwing it.
- Ghosts cannot write in books that are closed, but they can throw the book.

name: Ghost Orbs
about:
[Ghost Orbs](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Ghost_Orb) appear as small, faint, spherical orbs and are detected using any [video feed](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Video_Feed) with night vision. 
- They will appear in the ghost's favorite room.
- [The Mimic](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/The_Mimic) has Ghost Orbs as a "false" evidence.
- A hand-held [Video Camera](https://phasmophobia.fandom.com/wiki/Video_Camera) is often better than relying on stationary cameras, since Ghost Orbs can move.
- It is best to check for Ghost Orbs when lights are off.
